jobDetails: Created and maintained Python profile scripts that supported Irdeto's scalable, cloud-based automated crawling technology, which combatted illegal video on demand content streams and live events.
Maintained Irdeto's internal profile script tracking app that managed the profile scripts used to crawl for the online infringing content.
Added domain search and UI features to our profile tracking app to make it easier for our developers and analyst to work with and update our profile scripts.
Contributed to a team built Google Chrome extension that automated manual form entry and reduced the strain for analysts to send DMCA take down notices.
Hosted the discovery team's retrospective meetings to analyze methods to improve overall productivity for each of our sprint cycles.
Converted our designer created advertising pages from Figma to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to influence our potential customers and advertise our early-stage start-up.
Executed manual web testing using multiple browsers, desktops, and mobile devices to ensure web pages were cross platform compatible across different browsers and devices.
Performed system testing on our web app to improve the functionality and usability of the app.
